quotes.quote: Destiny doesn't do home visits... you have to go for it yourself.
Whatever it is your heart desires, please go for it, it's yours to have.
We're renting the space that we call Earth, so we may as well just go for it.
Be confident in yourself, in your abilities, and in your goals. Then go for it.
You only regret what you don't do! Go for it, live your dreams and enjoy it all!
A second ago is gone, and a second from now might be. Now is all you've got. Go for it!
Don't be afraid to do the most insane thing. Don't think it's too crazy. Just go for it.
If you're around someone who makes you feel good, you have to go for it. Don't hold back.
The purpose of education is to create a purpose for life. Go for it with the utmost sincerity.
Once you are prepared and you think you have every angle of preparation covered, you have to go for it.
If you can find something you love, go for it everyday of your life, and it would be really good to you.
Your future shines bright - find your purpose and go for it. Starting tomorrow, you can change the world.
A, surround yourself by positive people who will help you reach your goal and support you. And B, go for it!
Risk it; go for it. Life always gives you another chance, another go at it. It's very important to take enormous risks.
When you feel that you can't fight it, you just go for it. When it comes to the arts, passion should always trump common sense.
When chasing a dream, make sure the price is truly worth paying - if it is, go for it, if not, tweak your dream a little and then go for it.
You have to focus on what's important to you and go for it. But don't stab people in the back. It poisons your whole life if you're like that.
No matter how long the preparation, you will never feel ready to write an exam, to start a business, to be parent or even to die. Just go for it.
When good enough gets the job done, go for it. It's way better than wasting resources or, even worse, doing nothing because you can't afford the complex solution.

You have to dream big and go for it. Surround yourself with people who believe in you and ignore those who try to bring you down. Never give up, no matter what - overcoming obstacles makes you stronger!

If you're passionate about what you do, then go for it wholeheartedly. Be prepared that if anytime, you may be surprised by a phenomenal opportunity that may come your way, and that's when I say, do your homework. Be ready.
If you like something, go for it.
Dream! Dream! And then go for it!
Believe in yourself and go for it.
If something excites you, go for it.
Good things happen when you go for it!
What you want is within reach. Go for it.
Get out, realize your dream, and go for it.
Never give up. You only get one life. Go for it!
Dreams can come true, but you have to go for it.
To satisfy a want or a need, you must first go for it
You just go for it and see what works. There are no rules.
When you find what you want in life, you just gotta go for it.
If you want to do something, go for it -you've got nothing to lose.
You're the only one who can make the difference. Whatever your dream is, go for it.
You should have a dream and absolutely go for it. Don't let anybody say you can't do it.
Anything that you think is wild or fun, or can't wait to see or show your friends, go for it.
Never doubt yourself. Never change who you are. Don't care what people think and just go for it.
Unleash your life's potential! Don't hold back on the things you've always wanted to do. Go for it!
Just keep being true to yourself, if you're passionate about something go for it. Don't sacrifice anything, just have fun.
Don't listen to anybody who's trying to bring you down. There's so much negativity in the world. If you really want something, then you go for it.
If you are talented, you can really do anything. And if your heart is at the right place and you have the passion for it, you can go for it and do it.
